Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; traces of faded lotus in added white outline and red centres; exterior: dot and billet pattern at rim above broken maeander pattern with dots between pairs of dilute lines; below, part of hooked swastika and cross as filling ornament.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the rim pattern, see British Museum 1888.0601.472.a.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0464) (phase 2)
